author: Noah Nguyen
title: Bijou School Hosts Hour of Code Event - DevX
text: In early December, around 150 students at Bijou Community School joined the Hour of Code event, a global initiative taking place during Computer Science Education Week. The participating pupils engaged in interactive coding exercises, collaborating with peers from different grade levels to gain a deeper understanding of coding principles. The Hour of Code seeks to demystify computer science and inspire students to pursue further learning in the field. This annual [event](https://www.devx.com/terms/event/) occurs in conjunction with the birthday of Admiral Grace Murray Hopper, a computer science pioneer. Its main objective is to raise awareness about [artificial intelligence](https://www.devx.com/devx/how-startups-take-advantage-of-artificial-intelligence/) (AI) and expand young learners’ understanding of computer science, specifically focusing on AI technologies. Bijou Coding Enrichment Club leads the way Members of the afterschool Bijou Coding Enrichment Club shared their computer science knowledge by conducting interactive sessions for 3rd, 4th, and 5th-grade students. Together, they created AI-driven projects, with club members guiding younger students through developing algorithms and programming languages for [AI systems](https://www.devx.com/uncategorized/is-ai-really-elevating-the-automotive-industry-or-just-risking-everyones-welfare/). This hands-on approach ignited curiosity and creativity among participants, emphasizing the importance of acquiring computer science skills as [technology continues to advance](https://www.devx.com/terms/external-serial-advanced-technology-attachment/). Students also created dance party projects, T-Rex themed [video games](https://www.devx.com/artificial-intelligence-ai/is-ais-biggest-revolutionary-potential-for-gaming-going-to-be-for-workflow-and-production-processes/), and musical solar systems in collaboration with NASA, combining scientific discovery and entertainment in a unique way. Dr. Jamie Orr, the club leader [and a parent volunteer, underscored the importance of computer science education in fostering creativity, literacy, and problem-solving abilities in today’s](https://www.devx.com/news/problems-computers-cant-solve/) youth. Support from Lake Tahoe Community College The Lake Tahoe Community College (LTCC) HSI STEM outreach team lent support to the event in line with their mission to build a network for students interested in pursuing careers in STEM fields. Dr. Orr asserted that giving students access to quality computer science educational programs and resources empowers them to develop essential skills that will be valuable in many aspects of their lives. LTCC’s HSI STEM outreach team, in partnership with Bijou Community School, aims to create an engaging environment where students can explore interests and potential [career paths](https://www.devx.com/uncategorized/is-technology-a-good-career-path-how-to-know-if-technology-is-the-right-career-path-for-you/) in the continually expanding STEM fields. Recognition as a Hispanic Serving Institution The US Department of Education recognizes LTCC as a Hispanic Serving Institution, with a commitment to [enhancing](https://www.devx.com/terms/enhancement/) institutional programs and services for Hispanic Americans and other underserved groups. Through culturally relevant educational opportunities, resources, and support, LTCC seeks to improve the academic experience for its diverse student body. This recognition allows the college to [secure](https://www.devx.com/security/unlock-app-security-boost-developer-portals/) additional funding and partnerships focused on advancing equity and social mobility for Hispanic Americans and other traditionally underrepresented communities. Outreach team’s objectives The outreach team’s goals include improving STEM undergraduate education, while also increasing the recruitment, retention, and graduation rates of Latino/a/x and other minority students pursuing STEM degrees. To accomplish these objectives, the team employs various strategies, such as workshops, mentorship programs, and inclusive curricular enhancements to ensure all students have access to the necessary resources and support. Moreover, the team collaborates closely with faculty, staff, and community organizations to create a welcoming and supportive learning environment for Latino/a/x and other minority STEM students. First Reported on: [tahoedailytribune.com](https://www.tahoedailytribune.com/news/bijou-students-participate-in-global-hour-of-code/) Hour of Code Event FAQ What is the Hour of Code event? The Hour of Code event is a global initiative that takes place during Computer Science Education Week, aiming to demystify computer science and inspire students to pursue further learning in the field. The event usually occurs in conjunction with the birthday of Admiral Grace Murray Hopper, a computer science pioneer. What activities did the students participate in during the event? Students engaged in interactive coding exercises, collaborated with peers from different grade levels, and created AI-driven projects. They also developed algorithms and programming languages for AI systems, created dance party projects, T-Rex themed video games, and musical solar systems in collaboration with NASA. Who is Dr. Jamie Orr? Dr. Jamie Orr is the club leader of the Bijou Coding Enrichment Club and a parent volunteer. She emphasizes the importance of computer science education in fostering creativity, literacy, and problem-solving abilities among students. What is the role of Lake Tahoe Community College (LTCC) in this event? LTCC’s HSI STEM outreach team lent their support to the event and partnered with Bijou Community School. Their mission is to build a network for students interested in pursuing careers in STEM fields and create an engaging environment where students can explore their interests and potential career paths in the continually expanding STEM fields. What is the significance of LTCC’s recognition as a Hispanic Serving Institution? As a Hispanic Serving Institution, LTCC is committed to enhancing institutional programs and services for Hispanic Americans and other underserved groups. This recognition allows the college to secure additional funding and partnerships focused on advancing equity and social mobility for Hispanic Americans and other traditionally underrepresented communities. What are the objectives of the LTCC’s outreach team? The outreach team’s goals include improving STEM undergraduate education, increasing the recruitment, retention, and graduation rates of Latino/a/x and other minority students pursuing STEM degrees. They employ strategies such as workshops, mentorship programs, and inclusive curricular enhancements to ensure all students have access to the necessary resources and support. The team also collaborates with faculty, staff, and community organizations to create a welcoming and supportive learning environment for Latino/a/x and other minority STEM students.

author: El Nuevo Día
title: Surinam enviará militares y policías a Haití para asistir durante el proceso de transición - El Nuevo Día
text: Los haitianos aguardan con esperanza la llegada de una misión multinacional liderada por Kenia que ayude a restaurar la seguridad en el país 5 de mayo de 2024 - 3:53 PM Los haitianos aguardan con esperanza la llegada de una misión multinacional liderada por Kenia que ayude a restaurar la seguridad en el país 5 de mayo de 2024 - 3:53 PM San Juan - El presidente de Surinam, Chan Santokhi, anunció este domingo que su Gobierno está preparado para enviar militares y policías a [Haití ](https://www.elnuevodia.com/topicos/haiti/)para asistir a las fuerzas de seguridad durante el proceso de transición en la isla caribeña. Según dijo Santokhi hoy a un grupo de comunicadores locales, el grupo de seguridad lo están elaborando los ministros de Defensa y la Policía, y el de Justicia, junto al cuerpo policial y del Ejército Nacional de Surinam. “Apoyaremos a nuestra hermana nación de la Comunidad del Caribe (Caricom). Le proveeremos respaldo, así como una delegación de policías liderada por [Kenia](https://www.elnuevodia.com/topicos/kenia/), entre otras cosas”, dijo Santokhi. Los haitianos aguardan con esperanza la llegada de una misión multinacional liderada por Kenia que ayude a restaurar la seguridad en el país, en medio de las discrepancias que reinan en el seno del Consejo Presidencial de Transición solo ocho días después de su puesta en marcha. La violencia de las bandas armadas sigue protagonizando la vida en gran parte de Haití, en especial en la zona metropolitana de Puerto Príncipe, como quedó patente en la madrugada del 1 al 2 de mayo en áreas capitalinas como Solino o Delmas 24. Ante esta inseguridad, agravada desde finales de febrero pasado, buena parte de la población tiene puestas sus esperanzas en las fuerzas multinacionales, que cuentan con el visto bueno de la [ONU ](https://www.elnuevodia.com/topicos/onu/)y cuyo despliegue, según el ministro de Asuntos Exteriores de Bahamas, Fred Mitchell, comenzará el 26 de mayo. El jefe de estado mencionó que el apoyo se dividirá en tres niveles: internacional, regional y bilateral. A nivel internacional, una resolución de seguridad fue firmada por la ONU para respaldar a Haití mandando a un grupo de policías de índole internacional. Esta propuesta fue apoyada por Surinam. Ante ello, Santokhi sostuvo que los oficiales que vayan a ser escogidos para formar parte del escuadrón tendrán que estar preparados y que no necesariamente serán miembros de las agencias de seguridad de Surinam. “No enviaremos solamente a nuestra gente”, advirtió. “¿Ustedes saben cuánta gente muere en Haití a diario por estallidos?”, cuestionó Santokhi. De acuerdo con el presidente surinamés, más personas mueren en Haití a diario que por la [ guerra entre Rusia y Ucrania](https://www.elnuevodia.com/topicos/conflicto-entre-rusia-y-ucrania/), y que el país caribeño ha recibido “muy poca ayuda” de otros territorios vecinos. En este sentido, pidió que los países miembros de la Comunidad del Caribe (Caricom) sean más solidarios con Haití. “La paz internacional y la solidaridad te influye como país a contribuir de la manera en que puedas. Algún día necesitarás de Haití o algún otro país amistoso”, resaltó. Bahamas es uno de los países que se han comprometido a enviar efectivos a Haití en el marco de la misión, junto a Kenia, Burkina Faso y varios países del [Caribe](https://www.elnuevodia.com/topicos/caribe/), entre otros Estados. Te invitamos a descargar cualquiera de estos navegadores para ver nuestras noticias:

author: 文海艺岱
title: 《反诈破局》今天在腾讯视频上线 导演栗心博：以真实案例提高大家反诈意识
text:
齐鲁网·闪电新闻7月24日讯 山东广播电视台、山东广电传媒集团旗下山东卫视传媒有限公司出品的网络剧《反诈破局》今日在腾讯视频“十分短剧”剧场上线，导演栗心博称，与前作《反诈风暴》相比，该剧从受害者视角出发，以真实案例提高大家反诈意识。
闪电新闻记者 李玲 报道
来源：闪电新闻 编辑：李玲 责编：刘桂秋 审校：黄鹏伟 主编：张晓博

author: redacao@odia.com.br (Agência Brasil)
title: Fortes chuvas atingem Rio Grande do Sul na última sexta do ano
text: Várias áreas de Porto Alegre ficaram alagadas na manhã desta sexta-feiraX (antigo Twitter)/Reprodução Desde o início da manhã, a Defesa Civil do Rio Grande do Sul emitiu dois alertas em razão da situação meteorológica. No primeiro alerta, publicado às 6h54 e válido até as 18h, o órgão mencionou a possibilidade de “alagamentos pontuais, cheias em arroios e inundações em córregos e regiões ribeirinhas” na parte centro-sul do estado, incluindo a capital Porto Alegre. O segundo alerta, publicado às 10h23 e válido até as 15h, avisa a respeito de “chuvas e ventos pontualmente fortes, descargas elétricas e eventual queda de granizo” na região norte do Rio Grande do Sul. Há relatos de queda de árvores e queda de energia em ao menos dez municípios: Cândido Godói, Cerro Largo, Giruá, Horizontina, Santa Rosa, Santo Cristo, São Luiz Gonzaga, São Nicolau, Tucunduva e Ubiratema. Em Ubiratema, o telhado de uma quadra esportiva chegou a desabar, mas sem relatos de feridos. Previsão do tempo O órgão emitiu alerta laranja de perigo meteorológico, válido até as 17h desta sexta, informando sobre chuva entre 30 e 60 mm/h ou 50 e 100 mm/dia, ventos intensos (60-100 km/h) e queda de granizo. Há risco de corte de energia elétrica, estragos em plantações, queda de árvores e de alagamentos, segundo o Inmet. No sábado, 30, o tempo deve voltar a abrir, embora ainda com nebulosidade. A previsão para a virada do ano é de sol com muitas nuvens e ventos fracos.

author: info@kalkinemedia.com (EIN Presswire)
title: Compliant Client by eMars Makes Construction Payroll Less Labor Intensive as it Supports the Davis Bacon Act of 1931
text:
EINPresswire.com/ -- Making sure that every employee receives the prevailing wage on a government construction job may sound easy if the company has 2 or 3 employees. Add in 15 employees, 31 compliance issues, a variety of job titles for the same employee and flawless security regarding employee information, well, then a group of payroll people need to handle the job.
Or… a web-based system that seamlessly, finds any
Davis Baconcompliance issues and alerts the payroll manager about errors that could lead to jail time or heavy fines. That same system offers a 3-minute payroll. Would a huge savings of time and money compared to a manually prepared payroll be a smart choice for a construction company that does business with the government?
A worry-free payroll system for
construction companiesdoing business with the federal government is available.
Compliant Client by eMars was created in 2001 to give construction company owners an easy, flawless, paperless way to be compliant with the Davis Bacon Act of 1931 that enforces a prevailing wage and 31 other compliance issues. This congressional act requires private contractors to be in compliance with each check paid to employees on all federally funded construction projects over $2,000.
Compliant Client was designed with input from the Department of Labor and government contractors. Government auditors are given a portal to view the progress of every project. A real-time environment was created to block contractors from altering pay rates then submitting payroll.
Construction companies need this type of system to stay in compliance with the Davis Bacon Act.
Many construction companies, however, prepare their payrolls manually. Humans make errors.
Compliant Client by eMars is used by many construction companies.
More than 48,000+ users are handling projects in 45 states, Guam, the Virgin Islands, and Puerto Rico use Compliant Client. This system processes between 2,000 and 3,000 payrolls a day. Some payrolls have thousands of workers. Other payrolls have as few as 15 employees.
Compliant Client provides immediate, concurrent, real time visibility of all payroll records of the sub, prime, plus - the owner agency. All screens are printable via this paperless system. Every submitted payroll is audited, online and in real time. The results are instantaneous, allowing for immediate corrections.
A typical payroll is prepared by 1 person in less than 3 minutes.
Compliant Client requires a PC and about 30 minutes of training. Complete implementation takes less than 1 day. Users report an 80% productivity improvement over manual payrolls.
Compliant Client also encrypts its at rest data.
"Security is tantamount", says Woody Chamberlain, President of eMars/Compliant Client.
Mr. Chamberlain continued: “Users have a choice of 13 different security roles. Each role enables the user to perform defined processes.”
Easily stay compliant with the Davis Bacon Act of 1931.
Encrypted. Strong. Easy to use. Web based. Fairly priced.
Woody Chamberlain
eMars / Compliant Client
+1 480-595-0466
email us here

author: 中國時報林雅惠
title: 美濃小黑蚊大爆發！2分鐘就被叮得滿腳包　民眾崩潰不敢出門 | 生活 | CTWANT
text:
美濃小黑蚊大爆發！2分鐘就被叮得滿腳包 民眾崩潰不敢出門
美濃居民邱先生說，看見2歲半的孫子全身被叮得滿是紅點，尤其頭部、手部腫脹嚴重，讓他十分擔憂。（圖／中國時報林雅惠攝）
高雄市美濃區近期爆發有史以來最嚴重的小黑蚊侵襲，數量之多讓居民苦不堪言，不僅戶外活動受限，就連在家中休息也無法倖免，居民表示，站在門外短短2分鐘，雙腿便被叮咬數十處，學校學生亦受影響，生活品質大幅下降，期盼公部門能協助想想解方。
美濃區合和里長林作松表示，這波小黑蚊大爆發堪稱歷年來最嚴重，許多居民反映，過去長輩們常坐在騎樓聊天，如今人人避之唯恐不及，就算緊閉門窗，在家中仍難逃叮咬；「有時候里民來找我，站在門口2分鐘就被叮得滿腳包」，他無奈地說，「自己也深受其害，每天都被叮得紅腫發癢。」
居民朱先生也苦笑表示，原本每天喜歡坐在陽台乘涼，現在待不到幾分鐘，雙腿就被咬得紅腫，不得不放棄這習慣。另一名邱先生則心疼地說，看見2歲半的孫子全身被叮得滿是紅點，尤其頭部、手部腫脹嚴重，讓他十分擔憂。
不僅居民飽受困擾，學校師生也受到波及，某校校長表示，今年冬季雨水豐沛，導致環境潮溼、青苔滋生，加速小黑蚊的繁殖速度，影響校內學生學習狀況，校方已緊急請廠商噴藥消毒，並提醒學生穿著長袖衣褲，以減少被叮咬的機會。
商家同樣苦不堪言，美濃商圈促進會理事長林享達指出，粄條店、咖啡店及餐廳業者接連反映，小黑蚊的數量異常驚人，顧客一坐下就被叮得受不了，生意大受影響。「就連美濃湖散步的民眾，也被叮得滿身是包，」他說，許多遊客因此縮短停留時間，影響當地觀光。
面對來勢洶洶的小黑蚊，居民紛紛向里長反映，希望請相關單位介入解決；對此，高雄市農業局表示，美濃區公所已洽環保局清潔隊擇日施藥，以降低小黑蚊密度，另外，建議民眾注意清除孳生源青苔，並穿著長袖長褲及鞋襪防止被叮咬，若不慎被叮咬，可用冷水沖洗或冰敷，以減輕紅腫與搔癢的不適。

author: mbracken
title: New zero-day exploit targets Ivanti VPN product
text:
Cybersecurity New zero-day exploit targets Ivanti VPN product After Ivanti detected the activity, Mandiant says it found malware in impacted devices associated with a Chinese-linked threat group. By Matt Bracken
January 9, 2025
Listen to this article 0:00 Learn more. This feature uses an automated voice, which may result in occasional errors in pronunciation, tone, or sentiment. (Getty Images)
A year after a series of vulnerabilities impacting a pair of Ivanti VPN products prompted an emergency directive from the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency to federal agencies, the Utah-based software firm is again experiencing issues with one of its signature systems.
The company on Wednesday disclosed two vulnerabilities — CVE-2025-0282 and CVE-2025-0283 — that were affecting Ivanti Connect Secure (ICS) appliances. Mandiant, enlisted by Ivanti in the investigation and analysis of the vulnerabilities, said in a blog post that it had discovered zero-day exploitation of CVE-2025-0282 in the wild starting in mid-December of last year.
That particular vulnerability, the Google Cloud-owned security firm noted, “is an unauthenticated stack-based buffer overflow.” If successfully exploited, unauthenticated remote code execution is possible, which could lead to “potential downstream compromise of a victim network.”
Ivanti, which is working to address the issues in concert with Mandiant as well as impacted customers, government partners and security vendors, was able to identify the compromise thanks to some commercial security monitoring tools and its Integrity Checker Tool.
Advertisement In February 2024, CISA and several intelligence partners issued an advisory saying that the Integrity Checker Tool was “ not sufficient ” in detecting compromises, a charge that Ivanti strongly disputed . That advisory came after the January 2024 emergency directive from CISA regarding vulnerabilities in Ivanti’s VPN products and subsequent instructions from the cyber agency on how to update and bring those devices back online in the wake of reports that the vulnerable devices were being targeted by Chinese espionage operations .
On Thursday, CISA added the latest vulnerability to its Known Exploited Vulnerability (KEV) catalog .
For the current vulnerabilities plaguing Ivanti’s products, the company has released patches and urged customers to secure their systems via instructions in its security advisory.
In the Wednesday blog post, Mandiant researchers said their analysis found signs of SPAWN in infected systems, noting that the deployment of that malware ecosystem has been attributed to the China-linked UNC5337, a group believed to be part of UNC5221.
Other malware families observed by Mandiant in compromised Ivanti systems include DRYHOOK and PHASEJAM, neither of which are currently linked to a specific threat group.
Advertisement “Mandiant assesses that defenders should be prepared for widespread, opportunistic exploitation, likely targeting credentials and the deployment of web shells to provide future access,” the firm’s researchers concluded. “Additionally, if proof-of-concept exploits for CVE-2025-0282 are created and released, Mandiant assesses it is likely additional threat actors may attempt targeting Ivanti Connect Secure appliances.”
A spokesperson for Ivanti said in an email to CyberScoop that the company has “worked in close collaboration with Mandiant on the analysis of the recently disclosed vulnerabilities to ensure the accuracy of the findings and in order to provide customers with the most comprehensive guidance possible. We remain committed to prioritizing our customers and continuously improving our products and processes through collaboration with our partners and the broader security ecosystem.”
This story was updated Jan. 9, 2025, with a comment from an Ivanti spokesperson.
topics: Science and Technology->information technology and computer science

author: Tyler James
title: Winter Storm Warning Brings Heavy Snow to Crater Lake and Surrounding Areas Until Friday
text:
If you're dreaming of visiting Crater Lake this winter, get ready for some serious snow—and if you're heading up anytime soon, be prepared. A Winter Storm Warning is in effect for mountain areas of southern Oregon above 5,000 feet, including the breathtaking Crater Lake National Park. This winter wonderland of sapphire blue waters and steep volcanic cliffs will soon be enveloped in an even heavier blanket of snow, adding a magical touch to one of Oregon’s most cherished landmarks. However, this storm brings more than beauty; it brings challenging travel conditions.
According to the National Weather Service, heavy snowfall is expected through 5:00 p.m. Friday, with additional snow accumulations ranging between 6 and 12 inches. The storm will be accompanied by winds gusting up to 45 miles per hour, adding to the already intense winter experience. These conditions will affect not only Crater Lake but also the Southern Oregon Cascades, the Siskiyou Mountains, and nearby areas, including Diamond Lake and high-altitude highways like 230, 62, 138, and Highway 58 at Willamette Pass.
While Crater Lake is a mesmerizing sight in winter, the same elements that make it so stunning also pose risks. Travel could be challenging to nearly impossible due to the heavy snow and gusty winds. Falling tree branches from wind stress are an additional hazard, especially for those navigating the mountain highways. Road conditions can change rapidly, and visibility can drop with blowing snow, making it essential for visitors to exercise extreme caution if they plan on traveling through these regions.
For those who do brave the journey, it’s crucial to be prepared for emergencies. Pack essentials like an extra flashlight, food, and water. Stashing a few blankets and an emergency kit in your vehicle could also make a big difference. Oregon’s road conditions are accessible via TripCheck at www.tripcheck.com , where you can find the latest updates and closures before and during your trip.
If you're a fan of winter adventure and stunning snowy vistas, Crater Lake and the surrounding mountains offer an incredible backdrop—but only for those who come prepared. Whether you’re heading up to enjoy the scenery or just passing through, take the warning seriously and prepare for the unique challenges of winter travel in one of Oregon's most captivating landscapes.

author: @record_mexico
title: ¡Todo por el equipo! Buffalo Bills piden a sus aficionados ayuda para palear nieve en el estadio
text: ¡Todo por el equipo! Bills piden a sus aficionados ayuda para palear nieve en el estadio [Buffalo](https://www.record.com.mx/nfl-bills/sean-mcdermott-confirmo-que-gabe-davis-y-taylor-rapp-se-perderan-el-duelo-ante-steelers) ya se prepara para recibir a los [Acereros de Pittsburgh](https://www.record.com.mx/nfl-bills/sean-mcdermott-confirmo-que-gabe-davis-y-taylor-rapp-se-perderan-el-duelo-ante-steelers) en el juego de [Comodines de los Playoff ](https://www.record.com.mx/nfl-bills/sean-mcdermott-confirmo-que-gabe-davis-y-taylor-rapp-se-perderan-el-duelo-ante-steelers)de la NFL. El equipo se verá las caras con los de Pensilvania el domingo a las 12:00 horas del centro de México, sin embargo, previo al juego han solicitado la ayuda de sus aficionados. En un ambiente típico del norte de Estados Unidos, los Bills han recibido una nevada importante. A dos días del juego, el Highmark Stadium de Nueva York terminó sepultado por la nieve, por lo que el equipo necesita ayuda para dejarlo listo para el juego. “Los Buffalo Bills y Jani-King están pidiendo a cualquier persona interesada en palear nieve dentro del estadio para preparar el lugar para el partido local de los Bills contra los Steelers. Los paleadores pueden palear nieve durante la noche del sábado hasta el domingo por la mañana si es necesario. La tarifa de pago es de $20 por hora. Se proporcionarán alimentos y descansos de cortesía durante los turnos en un área cómoda y cálida. Aquellos interesados en palear deben tener una identificación con fotografía adecuada para trabajar”, reveló el equipo a través de un comunicado. De acuerdo con reportes del clima, durante las siguientes horas estarán cayendo entre 1 y 3 pulgadas de nieves por hora. Ante esta situación el equipo ha solicitado la ayuda para mantener el estadio en buenas condiciones de cara al partido del domingo. Los Bills estarán buscando seguir con su racha ganadora, sin embargo, tendrá que hacer algo que no logran en casi 100 años, vencer a Pittsburgh en un juego de Playoffs. We’re going to need some shovelers to get [@HighmarkStadm]ready for Sunday! How you can help: [https://t.co/Wvx1Pa1ILo] [pic.twitter.com/G6WcRiYofJ] — Buffalo Bills (@BuffaloBills) [January 12, 2024] [TAMBIÉN TE PUEDE INTERESAR: ¡JUNTOS DE NUEVO! RUSSELL WILSON Y PETE CARROLL SE REENCONTRARON](https://www.record.com.mx/nfl-seahawks/juntos-de-nuevo-russell-wilson-y-pete-carroll-se-reencontraron)

author: Mickaël Bazoge
title: Google va officiellement brider la batterie du Pixel 6a pour éviter les accidents de surchauffe
text:
Au-delÃ de 400 cycles de charge, la batterie de certains Pixel 6a doit Ãªtre bridÃ©e pour Ã©viter des cas de surchauffe, qui peuvent aboutir Ã des brÃ»lures, voire provoquer des dÃ©parts d’incendies.
